title: Rush rush-plugins.json config file
description: This file defines plugins used by Rush

plugins.description: A list of rush plugin definition.

packageName.description: The NPM package name of the rush plugin.

pluginName.description: The plugin name provided by rush plugin package.

autoinstallerName.description: Specifies an autoinstaller name where the rush plugin package is installed.

optionsJsonFilePath.description: Specifies the path of the options json configuration file to be used by this plugin. The path is resolved relative to the common/rush-plugins folder.
